Texts.Chs: 你对抗的那些鬼魂是相位物质组成成的。但它们也产生了一种物质，我称之为^red;以太^reset;。现在去找一处熔炉去冶炼以太碎片，然后去铁砧处锻造你的天拓·以太。
Texts.Eng: The ghosts you fought were made of Phase Matter, but they also produced a substance I've named ^red;Ether^reset;. You can now craft Ethereal Blades in the Furnace and the Aether Tanto in your Anvil.
